titles.title: Honoring Cael Sanderson for his perfect collegiate wrestling record.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

action.text: Mr. Isakson moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 399.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/1/2002--Passed House amended. Congratulates Cael Sanderson for finishing his career as the first ever undefeated collegiate wrestler and recognizes the contributions of his family, the support staff of Iowa State University, and Cyclone fans.
